content: Because they stick with the project from the bottom, they deserve to enjoy the fruits of success. A crypto launchpad is the best place to find a project in its early stage. The number of cryptocurrencies keeps rising monthly. As per Statista confirms that there are over 7500 cryptocurrencies on the market.However, the rise of coins has also increased crypto scams. According to the Independent, crypto scams in 2021-2022 have risen by more than 30% compared to just a year prior.
